_description: A rubric advertising a prayer, with reference to a clerk in Aragon — six couplets

EDU42.First Lines:
Quhasaever othrys þis orisounIlk day with gud
                    deuociounOur lady sal nocht thoyl hym dee…
EDU42.Last Lines:
…þis myracle apint 1 m. cco forty and nyneIn
                    aragowne na lange syne
EDU42.Editions:
Borland,  Katherine R. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Western Medieval Manuscripts in
                Edinburgh University Library
         Edinburgh: University Press, 1916: 70.
